text: Jerrold Lewis Nadler (; born June 13, 1947) is an American politician. He is the U.S. Representative since 1992. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Nadler has also been Chairman of the House Judiciary Committee since 2019. According to the National Journal, Nadler is one of seven members of the House of Representatives who tie for most liberal. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Jerry Nadler official site at the U.S. House * Jerry Nadler for Congress * * * Article on the impeachment of Dick Cheney , ZMag * 2008 congressional screening questionnaire response from the 504 Democratic Club Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jerry Nadler
